snippet: The upcoming season will span many styles and eras, ranging from a reimagining of “Swan Lake” to a performance from the contemporary dance ensemble BalletBoyz.
abstract: Joyce Theater announces its fall/winter season highlights for 2015-16.
lead_paragraph: The upcoming season will span many styles and eras, ranging from a reimagining of “Swan Lake” to a performance from the contemporary dance ensemble BalletBoyz.
